channel.title: Help With Client
channel.description:
I am running on linux now due to their VPN network setting to run my server + client. I am using linux mint and i have been running it for a couple of days. I click my runserver.bat and it just opens in TextEditor. So this should mean that linux doesn't support .bat files and my question is. Is there another option to running my client, if so than what? and Could i change .bat to another file to open my client.
Thanks in Advance Punkzombie

item.title: Help With Client
item.dc:creator: @Punkzombie Punkzombie
item.description:
@Punkzombie wrote:

Thanks… if theres anyone who knows the what the code is please reply.

Read full topic

item.title: Help With Client
item.dc:creator: @Maximum_ZxZ Maximum ZxZ
item.description:
@Maximum_ZxZ wrote:

If it’s linux then, you need to change it in .sh but your code of your run.bat will be different. You will need to change it. I don’t know what’s the code though.

Read full topic
